Audio.Author: Oscar H. Marín-Gómez
Audio.Comments: Ref: Tape OHM000B 2015. Another group, maybe two or three birds in mature forest understory, near to Bremen campament. Low Montane Forest. Distance to Mic: 20m. Natural vocalization. bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
